attributes.action: To protect the R.A.F Aerobatic Team, The Red Arrows.
attributes.additional_details: The REDs have been going for over 50yrs and always operate to a high standard. They show the best in British engineering, spirit and other skills. They are a great income stream for the UK economy and also a great recruitment tool for our armed forces. They need to be saved and also given new British built aircraft to secure UK jobs but more importantly bring in finance through the role they play.
attributes.background: The Red Arrows generate £m's to the U.K. economy not only by performing at home based shows but also on Government deployed tours such as China in 2016 which earned U.K. trade a reported £6b and also the peace mission tour of The Middle East in 2017.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/202604
